CustomField.inlineHelpText: Last Page Only - When selected, the submit button will appear exclusively on the last page of the survey. Every Page - When chosen, the submit button will be consistently visible on all pages of the survey. Conditional All Pages - With this option, the submit button will be shown on all pages if a participant is rejected from progressing to the next stage based on their previous responses.
CustomField.label: Submit Button Display Options

value.fullName: Show at All Pages when Rejected from Next Stage
value.label: Conditional All Pages
